divs: Sighting Detailsout on deck when other witness says "UFO!" so i look up and observe three soft white lights spaced approximately the thickness of your thumb at arms length .I also looked closely to judge it as one solid object and it was so fast yet made absolutely no sound.i looked for about three seconds before trees blocked view & i estimate it crossed entire sky in 7 to 10 seconds.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Petawawa
There were no other sightings in Petawawa on or around May 19th 2012
